channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Perfect Harmony
channel.desc: Best Man Jack and Maid of Honour Professor Barrett may not sing from the same hymn sheet, but working together on their friends' wedding might just result in a duet of a lifetime.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Pumpkin Everything
channel.desc: An up-and-coming novelist must confront an old flame from her past when she returns to her hometown to look after her stubborn grandfather and his pumpkin-themed store.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Dare To Say Yes
channel.desc: After being dumped and fired on the same day, Michelle is persuaded to attend a wellness and empowering program at a new retreat. Will she learn to Just Say Yes.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Date Whisperer
channel.desc: Date Whispering is the new trend in dating and Sam is the best one in LA. But when her service is called upon by her dad's life coach, will she learn the real meaning of true love.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Very Venice Romance
channel.desc: Amy travels to Venice to convince Chef Marcello to join her company's new venture. After Marcello declines, Amy turns up the heat. Will Marcello fold.

channel.title: Moriah's Lighthouse
channel.desc: Artisan Moriah dreams of restoring a lighthouse in her French seaside town, but then American architect Ben arrives and threatens to derail her plans.

channel.desc: When the older brother of the bride catches perpetual bridesmaid Cate's eye, she must choose between fanning old flames and lighting new ones.

channel.desc: When a celebrity chef walks off his show, prep cook Anna must step into the spotlight and make the show her own, with the help of her Aussie cameraman and Portuguese location scout.
